welcome_message_body: Welcome to Edemissen, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We are glad to have you here and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hildesheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanover Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hanover Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.
